name: Carrie
description:
Carrie Description

The game takes place in Carrie’s dreams. You’ll travel through several rooms and will have to survive as long as you can without getting eat by candies !

At the end of each room, a NPC will spawn and ask you question about what happened during the level. The player is free to think that the NPC is telling the truth or lying. If the player failed discovering the truth, he will get cursed and playing will become such a pain for him !

Controls Move Attack Pause Requirements
  • 1920x1080 screen (Other resolutions not supported for now)
